channel.title: futurism on ryan jennings
channel.description: Recent content in futurism on ryan jennings

item.title: Artist, Art tisk
item.description: The wikipedia on art in the 21st century is hilariously lacking. Curious how distracted it all feels, rebounding in trauma from the constant suffering and crises. There are some great artists who get overlooked compared to economics, disasters, in-equality or technology. The art itself is reflected by that merely resembles pornography or violence. Art delivery has a digital / non-digital divide that correlates with the 21st century. The first 20 years have been a digital revolution.
